subject: Education
title: AI Tutors: Promise and Peril
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: AI Tutors: Promise and Peril.

hook.text: A student asks ChatGPT to explain photosynthesis. It gives a beautiful, confident, wrong answer.

buildup.text: AI tutors can generate explanations, answer questions, and provide instant feedback at any hour.

discovery.text: They excel at patient, personalized explanationâ€”never getting frustrated, always available.

twist.text: AI 'hallucinations'â€”confident incorrect answersâ€”can teach students wrong information convincingly.

climax.text: The future AI tutor must know what it doesn't know and say 'I'm not sure' more often.

punchline.text: An AI that never says 'I don't know' is the most dangerous kind.

quiz.question: What is the biggest risk of AI tutors in education?
options: They can confidently present incorrect information that students trust
They are too slow to generate responses
Students find them boring compared to human teachers
